    • Method Detail

      • stopCascadingMBeansFromHost

        void stopCascadingMBeansFromHost(ManagedHost managedHost)
        Instructs the cascader to stop cascading the MBeans exposed by the given managed host.
        Parameters:
        managedHost - a ManagedHost - if the MBeans exposed by this host are not currently being cascaded, then no action is performed
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the cascader's component state is not InitializationState.INITIALIZED
